ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Dragon faction-
ygData.msgSnippet: Make sure you re invis and have gate loaded. Then, port into CS and con either a wyvern or drake. (they usually don t come too close to the portal, so you
ygData.messageBody:
Make sure you're invis and have gate loaded. Then,
port into CS and con either a wyvern or drake. (they
usually don't come too close to the portal, so you
should be safe) then drop your invis and see if they
like you or not. =)

I say to have gate loaded "just in case", hehe.


--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> Anyone know a relatively safe way to test dragon
> faction? I want to go
> to Cobalt Scar, and have killed lots of giants.
> However, I am not sure
> how to find a safe place to check my faction before
> porting in. Hate
> to pop in and die, then have trouble finding help to
> gather my
> carcass. I don't currently have a guild, so getting
> assistance is
> often a problem.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
